attributes.action: Upgrade the worst Road in The UK - the A303
attributes.background: This road is the worst in the UK and has been for decades.  It costs the Southwest billions every year and it needs to be a dual lane Road from the M3 to the M5 now.

rejection.details:
Highways England has already scheduled an expansion of the A303 into a dual carriageway for early 2017. We're not sure what additional action you would like.

You can find out more about upgrade works on the A303 here: http://www.highways.gov.uk/roads/a303a358-work-to-create-an-expressway-to-the-south-west
